view

类 View

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.View
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.util.Observer

    public class View
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    View, support user interaction, do partial user input validation Corresponding Observable subject is Model

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  View.PHASE
      Determine the current or next phase

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      View()
      Initiate menu/map stages with corresponding .fxml file, set some default variables

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void allocateArmy(Country country)
      During start up and reinforcement phase, tell model that user clicked a valid country to allocate army Called by View.clickedCountry() after the click event is verified and distributed
      void clickedCountry(Country country)
      Called when user clicked a country For reinforcement phase: add clicked counter For fortification phase: set selected countries
      void clickedMap()
      During fortification phase, reset selected countries
      void closeMapStage()
      Close the map editor, show beginning of the menu page Called when 'quit' is click through the map editor menu
      void closeMenuStage()
      Quit the game Called when 'Quit' button is clicked on the menu, and then user click 'Yes' button to confirm
      void fortification(java.lang.String enteredNumArmiesMoved)
      During fortification phase, receive a user entered value, check whether the selected countries info is valid, then verify user entered value.
      void initialize(Model model)
      Allow View to pass the selected file path back to the Model Called by Model Observable subject
      void initializePlayer(int playerNum)
      After loading a valid file, receive number of player which user entered correctly create playerView, pass it to model Called when user entered a valid total number of players on the menu text field, then press enter
      void openMapEditor()
      Display map editor, user than can create a RISK map Called when user click the 'Map Editor' on the main page
      void prepareNextPhase()
      Called by PlayerView when current player has 0 army in hand, call Prefer next phase info, i.e. reset button, hide/show panes
      void selectMap()
      Select a RISK map file, then ask Model to validate Called when user click 'Select Map' button on menu
      void showMapStage()
      Hide the menu, draw every single map component, then display the map
      void showMenuStage()
      Display the beginning of page of the menu, user then can interact with i.e. click buttons Called when 'quit' button is clicked from the on-going game, then clear all previous work
      void skipFortificationPhase()
      During fortification phase, skip this phase if current user is not able to move armies i.e. only has one country left or the user does not want to Called by 'Skip' button on player view
      void startNextPhase()
      Resume the paused phase, active corresponding listeners Called when user click the 'Enter xxx phase' button Display or hide the relative info panes/buttons
      void update(java.util.Observable obs, java.lang.Object x)
      Observer update method, allow View to know what to do next Notified by corresponding Model Observable subject when game state changes

      • 从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • 构造器详细资料

      • View

        public View()
        Initiate menu/map stages with corresponding .fxml file, set some default variables

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        public void initialize(Model model)
        Allow View to pass the selected file path back to the Model Called by Model Observable subject
        参数:
        model - Model Observable subject

      • update

        public void update(java.util.Observable obs,
                   java.lang.Object x)
        Observer update method, allow View to know what to do next Notified by corresponding Model Observable subject when game state changes
        指定者:
        update 在接口中 java.util.Observer
        参数:
        obs - Model Observable subject
        x - Message object, encapsulated STATE info

      • showMenuStage

        public void showMenuStage()
        Display the beginning of page of the menu, user then can interact with i.e. click buttons Called when 'quit' button is clicked from the on-going game, then clear all previous work

      • showMapStage

        public void showMapStage()
        Hide the menu, draw every single map component, then display the map

      • closeMapStage

        public void closeMapStage()
        Close the map editor, show beginning of the menu page Called when 'quit' is click through the map editor menu

      • closeMenuStage

        public void closeMenuStage()
        Quit the game Called when 'Quit' button is clicked on the menu, and then user click 'Yes' button to confirm

      • openMapEditor

        public void openMapEditor()
        Display map editor, user than can create a RISK map Called when user click the 'Map Editor' on the main page

      • selectMap

        public void selectMap()
        Select a RISK map file, then ask Model to validate Called when user click 'Select Map' button on menu

      • initializePlayer

        public void initializePlayer(int playerNum)
        After loading a valid file, receive number of player which user entered correctly create playerView, pass it to model Called when user entered a valid total number of players on the menu text field, then press enter
        参数:
        playerNum - valid total number of players for the game with specific loaded RISK map file

      • allocateArmy

        public void allocateArmy(Country country)
        During start up and reinforcement phase, tell model that user clicked a valid country to allocate army Called by View.clickedCountry() after the click event is verified and distributed
        参数:
        country - the Country which current armies should be added by one

      • fortification

        public void fortification(java.lang.String enteredNumArmiesMoved)
        During fortification phase, receive a user entered value, check whether the selected countries info is valid, then verify user entered value. However, condition "there is a path between these two countries that is composed of countries that the user owns" has to be checked by Model Called after user enter the number of armies moved value and press enter
        参数:
        enteredNumArmiesMoved - user entered number of armies value

      • skipFortificationPhase

        public void skipFortificationPhase()
        During fortification phase, skip this phase if current user is not able to move armies i.e. only has one country left or the user does not want to Called by 'Skip' button on player view

      • prepareNextPhase

        public void prepareNextPhase()
        Called by PlayerView when current player has 0 army in hand, call Prefer next phase info, i.e. reset button, hide/show panes

      • startNextPhase

        public void startNextPhase()
        Resume the paused phase, active corresponding listeners Called when user click the 'Enter xxx phase' button Display or hide the relative info panes/buttons

      • clickedCountry

        public void clickedCountry(Country country)
        Called when user clicked a country For reinforcement phase: add clicked counter For fortification phase: set selected countries
        参数:
        country - the country which user clicked

      • clickedMap

        public void clickedMap()
        During fortification phase, reset selected countries
